long_description: The Black Diamond Ice Clipper lets you rack up to 6 ice screws on your harness. Molded lip on top allows you to stack screws while searching for the right length to deploy. Huge hot-wire gate opening allows ice screws and other tools to be clipped and unclipped with easy 1-hand operation. Hard plastic body keeps its shape yet remains flexible; flat back reduces rotation. Compatible with any harness.
short_description: The Black Diamond Ice Clipper lets you rack up to 6 ice screws on your harness.
